message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.NI 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of erasure codes in data storage systems, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The study of queueing theory and scheduling policies also falls under the category of computer systems and networking (cs.SY) and networked information systems (cs.NI). Finally, the analysis of degraded reads in distributed data storage is related to the field of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
